articles.title: Meghan Markle's 'Suits' upstaging King Charles' birthday parade - New York Post
articles.description: Netflix announced the programming last month, writing on Twitter, “Suits — The Complete Series is coming to Netflix (in The US) on June 17.”
articles.content:
The drama!
